title: Arslan Senki (TV) Gaiden
original_name: アルスラーン戦記 外伝
opening_song: "Uzu to Uzu" (渦と渦) by NICO Touches the Walls (ep 2)
sinopse: It has been announced that Hiromu Arakawa's Arslan Senki manga will bundle OVAs in the fifth and sixth volumes, to be released on May 9 and November 9 respectively. The first OVA will include an original story supervised by Hiromu Arakawa, while the content of the second OVA has not been announced yet.
